reviews.review: Kendisi bildiÄŸiniz Ã¼zere bir efsane. Fazla sÃ¶ze gerek yok indirimlerde baya iniyor indirim varken alÄ±n, oynayÄ±n derim. Asla piÅŸman olacaÄŸÄ±nÄ±z bir oyun deÄŸil. Hikaye altyapÄ±sÄ±, grafikleri, game design ve fizik motoru Ã§ok iyi. Yapay zekasÄ± da Ã§ok iyi, sizi zorluyor baya. 10/10 oyun.
Ambientazione bellissima, trama valida, colpi di scena, quasi puzzle, storia fantastica e anche capace di far suscitare ansia. E' della valve dopo tutto

Este juego es el sucesor del pionero half life y con este se heredÃ³ todas las dinÃ¡micas de juego y la historia es tan llamativa y no puedes evitar dejar de lado porque cada parte es muy interesante.

As hyped as I'm sure you've heard this game is. It truly lives up to that hype in every way. The plot may need thickening but the gameplay is what makes this older game shine like a diamond in the rough. I cannot recommend this experience enough for any FPS player.

sin duda este es uno de los mejores juegos que podras encontrar, te recomiendo muchisimo comprarlo, pero aun mas te recomiendo jugar el primer juego antes que este, por que hace de la experiencia mas fascinante.
Enserio te recomiendo comprarlo, es una joya, aparte corre en ordenadores chafas asi que no te preocupes por ese tema, una de las cosas que no me gustan son los puntos de carga,  que actualmente son algo anticuados y molestos, pero nada mas que eso, lo demas es diamante puro
Holy shit how but vehicles sections are aids and the plaza fight makes me want to kms. 9/10
Segunda entrega de la tremenda saga Half-Life, mi favorito de todos los de la saga. Gran historia, mapas y enemigos. Lo juguÃ© muchas veces fuera de Steam.

I originally played HL2 when it was free for a short while, I loved it so much that i decided to buy it so that I could play it again, because a single playthrough wasn't enough for me. There is a reason that it has recieved so much praise, 100% recommended. Even now, after my third playthrough, I still want to know more about the universe in the game.
A legendary game with its interactive physics and fascinating graphic.

What's to say? It's a fantastics classic! If you've never played this, try it. If you're into FPS, single player, worth whatever you respectfully paid. ğŸ‘

Half Life 2 is an unequivocal videogame Classic, no argument about that. This game has some of the best atmosphere and immersion ever made, the characters are all distinct and memorable, controls are effortless to pick up and play, plenty of standout moments and missions, and the impact it made in gaming innovation reverberates almost 20 years after its release. I recommend it like I'd recommend all movie lovers watch Citizen Kane and the Godfather Trilogy.

With that said it is nowhere near the greatest game of all time. The only reason I recommend it is for its historical importance, any game lover should be familiar with the classics, but just like Citizen Kane there are many places where HL 2 falters. A few chapters are far too long, slowing the pace to a crawl. Mission progress roadblocks that rely on activating unintuitive programming triggers i.e. battling endless spawning enemies in an apartment complex with no way forward until you walk over some "magic" spot and a wall blows up and allows you to continue, super frustrating. The first 3/4 of the game was a lot of fun, the last 1/4 was like eating glass. I could barely play more than 20 minutes at a time because I would get so angry at the endless enemies, invincible monsters, confusing maps, and arbitrary roadblocks. But I pushed through, after all that effort and anger and stress I persevered to the end and... that final battle... that ending... seriously???? I am beside myself with disappointment. I genuinely regret those final 5 hours. I'm glad its over now so I can uninstall this and not pick it up again.

Final word: Gamers should play through HL 2 once because of its significance in the history of gaming but its okay to not love this game, its far from perfect.

Literally everything about this game is amazing. The characters? Amazing. The story? Amazing. The music? Amazing. The gameplay? not quite as amazing as everything else, but still pretty great. It's just great all around, and it can run smoothly on the most toaster of computers.
This game is like my grandpa if my grandpa was Half-Life 2

An excellent follow up to one of personal favourite games 
While the core combat loop is not as strong compared to its predecessor in my opinion with the lack of variety and the large amount of hit scan the rest of the game is something special. With an incredibly advanced physics engine ,one of the most immersive stories i have ever played and absolutely phenomenal level design the games positives heavily outweigh the negatives. While I do personally prefer the first game this is still a must play for practically anyone.
